name: Cannon Volt
description:
Playing the game is simple:

Use the ARROW KEYS or WASD to position your cannon,

then use SPACE to fire.

You can shoot the enemy but you cannot shoot the missiles that are coming for you, but you can block them by using the "fence" behind the cannon.  The "fence" is always protecting your back so use it well.

This is a Java Game I'm working to reduce the file size to go down to 4kb.  The concept is there and ready, still figuring out how to reduce the size overall.

Just thought it was fun to try my hand at it, this is my first time doing so.
